info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 08 at 1:56PM CST until January 08 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN CALDWELL...NORTHEASTERN GUADALUPE...SOUTH CENTRAL BASTROP AND NORTHERN GONZALES COUNTIES... At 155 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Palmeto State Park, or 10 miles south of Luling, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Luling, Waelder, Kingsbury, Staples, Fentress, Palmeto State Park, Brownsboro, Delhi, Leesville, Joliet, Oak Forest, Belmont, McNeil, Cost, Dilworth, Thompsonville, Ottine, Monthalia, and Tilmon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
